body:
Hey, so recently this has been happening to me for the past few days. I used to have good speedtest results but now, when I run a speedtest, I would attain a very bad download speed but somewhat a reasonable upload speed.



Help?
body_tagged:
Hey, so recently this has been happening to me for the past few days. I used to have good speedtest results but now, when I run a speedtest, I would attain a very bad download speed but somewhat a reasonable upload speed.



Help?
title: WiFi problem

replies.body:
Maybe your and other's (neighbour's) WiFi channels coincide. You can use WiFi analyser app to check it. If yes, then you should change channel in settings of your wifi modem.
Also it may be problem with your Internet provider or modem (it is broken).
replies.body_tagged:

For me
At least there's nothing wrong with Singtel.
Have you tried resetting?
